properties.name: Extra Stat to Saves
properties.author: bmos (Wil Thieme)
properties.description: This extension adds a second set of ability cyclers on the combat tab so that classes like paladins can add CHA (or any other ablity mod) to their saves.

announcement.text: https://github.com/bmos/FG-PFRPG-Extra-Stat-to-Saves\nPFRPG Extra Stat to Saves v2.3:\nThis extension adds a second set of ability cyclers on the combat tab so that classes like paladins can add CHA (or any other ablity mod) to their saves
